com.smaato.soma
Class SynchronizationException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              com.smaato.soma.SomaException
                  com.smaato.soma.SynchronizationException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SynchronizationException
extends SomaException

Is thrown when SOMA cannot be synchronized, e.g. when the user denies web access or when automatic synchronization is disabled.

Copyright Smaato Inc. 2007, 2008

See Also:
